EmailTemplate.name: CSP New Member Welcome Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to IATA Customer Portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!$Label.ISSP_Email_do_not_reply}
Dear {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
We are happy to have you with us in our IATA Customer Portal!
The IATA Customer Portal is packed with useful services, product information, useful tips and tricks specially tailored for you. You can use it to contact our Customer Services Team easily, including live chat or directly purchase from our online store. It's your gate to IATA!
Take me to the Portal!.
To enhance your IATA Customer Portal experience even more, you can complete your account information whenever you want to. You can easily do so by clicking here.
We hope you enjoy our IATA Customer Portal!
Thanks for being part of IATA.
IATA
